issue.title: [Java][Doc] Define next steps for Arrow Tools module
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17921](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17921). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are functionalities such as [GenerateSampleData.java](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/java/vector/src/main/java/org/apache/arrow/vector/GenerateSampleData.java) for example that needs to be reviewed and analyze how this functionality/utility will be related with Arrow Tools module and define a common patter to use for next utilities that are planning to create
